summary: ice: Fix spurious interrupt during removal of trusted VF
details:
ice: Fix spurious interrupt during removal of trusted VF

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.9 by commit 222544ea62d6b0c5882eab730c83dbdea17d28dd, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit efe41860008e57fb6b69855b4b93fdf34bc42798. For more details please see the references link.
